author: Jennifer Crewe
review: This app updated and has never worked correctly since . may 2025 updated and made the app worse. uninstall install this is really disappointing another waste of money and time. causes more stress and Anxiety trying to get it to work ðŸ˜ž

author: Cora Pendergast
review: I like the device so far. Only 3 stars because app isn't letting me change settings. working on it with customer service. Overall, enjoy using this and it seems helpful.

author: Phillip Rich
review: A bit challenging at times, but so far worth the challenge. I hope to continue building mental strength with this device and app.

author: Manolo Something
review: the app freezes once the logo pops up when opening it, so it's unusable. i have android on a fold5

author: Denis Odinokov
review: The results are random. The scores do not correlate with intentional concentration to move the ball. Consistent effort has no effect, and 15 training days yielded no progress. Only muscle tension, not mental effort, triggers responses.

author: Ruth Hermida
review: I just started using this, and I'm so disappointed that the app keeps glitching on me. Some of the buttons don't work with the articles on how the program works, and when I've done sessions, it freezes up. I'm debating on returning this, which I'm really bummed about

author: Julie Madsen
review: helps with focus and mood

author: Henrik F
review: It doesn't work. The Mendi logo is displayed, then nothing happens. Samsung Xcover 5, Android 14, One UI 6.1

author: Brandon Hutchins
review: Lately the app is frozen on the Mendi opening screen and not fully going into the app. while this first device is the best on the mark in terms of hardware, it's software (app) is glitchy and slow with fixes. Mendi must fix this as the Muse device is now exploring fNIR and their app is better. Muse's hardware of fNIR is still lacking. Step it up Mendi! If your app doesn't work, then your hardware is useless. when the fix comes, so will the rating changes so 1 star until the app is operational
reply_text: Hello Brandon, thank you for this review! You should be able to log in to your account regardless of the platform you log in from. If you have hard time accessing the same account from iOS or Android please email us at help@mendi.io and our customer success team will help you resolve this issue. Happy to have you with us!

author: Marco Vacarelu
review: The product is great so it's a shame how terribly buggy is this app. I'm on latest app version, latest android version on a google phone. Yet I have to restart the app everytime I want to change a setting before I start the practice. Any setting.. like duration of the practice etc. The video guides included are unwatchable, just keep freezing or won't open at all. Once you are doing the practice it works fine.

author: Thaddeus Cox, Ph.D.
review: Your response is that this was fixed in latest update--there is not one! Why so many bugs? I have to restart the app after completing the initial breathing exercise over half the time. Also, what is the reasoning of having us find a rest and complete a breathing exercise in forced portrait mode prior to taking a baseline of prefrontal activation, then requiring us to physically rotate the screen immediately prior to the measurement? It then freezes after a 15 min session losing all data.
reply_text: Hello Thaddeus, thank you for this feedback. The bugs you've encountered should be resolved in the latest app release. Please make sure to update and let us know if any of the issues persist.

author: Ran Ro
review: The new audio feedback update is distracting. I liked the simple stars (option 1), once the sound changed during longer focus, I lost focus. Please make it a ping sound that happens only ONE time when milestones during session are reached (every new 10% increase: ex 20-30% in blood flow a bell sound would ring.)This would help immensely in improving the session.I've had to ask people to mention when I reach a new increment (eyes closed sessions)and the results are much improved(50%+ improvement)

author: Sean J
review: consistency is key. I do feel more calm and focused after using it. great to use just before exercise or a job interview.

author: Caden Heazell
review: Good dose what intended but hurts eyes if you use it for to long

author: Abba C
review: why does it say I need to update, but there's no update option in the app store??
reply_text: Hello Abba, were you able to update the app? On our end we can see that you're running the latest version.

author: Jason O'Donnell
review: just wow.

author: Borough Daze
review: App has a lot of bugs and poorly functions. Bummer to buy a device to learn the app isn't worth the value.
reply_text: Hello Borough, have you been able to get in touch with our CS team at support@mendi.io? We can help you troubleshoot device-specific bugs you've encountered.

author: Timothy Bledsoe
review: Seeing improvements in focus. In May of 2024, I suffered a right cerebellum stroke, which has affected my life a lot. I started using Mendi back in April, and I have seen improvements in my focus. I just wish the VA hospital would offer Mendi to veterans for those who have suffered from strokes or other brain injuries.

author: Lindsay A Martin
review: Edit: I've used for more than 10 sessions at this point. None of the features have been improved upon. Truly a bummer. I've used it for two sessions now, and the in-app articles are duds. I can't open a single one. I'm genuinely considering returning the entire product due to this lack of functionality.
reply_text: Hello Lindsay! Have you already been in touch with our Customer Support team at support@mendi.io? If not, feel free to email us there, weâ€™ll be happy to help you troubleshoot any issues you're experiencing and get things working smoothly again.

author: Ben Nichols
review: The app glitches out and sometimes doesn't start the session after calibration
reply_text: Hello Ben, this issue should be resolved in the latest version of the app. Please update to the newest version, and let us know if youâ€™re still experiencing any problems. Weâ€™re here to help.

author: Michael Walsh
review: After some initial problems with the app everything is great. there are no problems tabulating my performance now and new features have been added. I am excited to jump in and develop this into a regular practice. ðŸ¥‹ðŸ¦¾ðŸ‘ºðŸ¤·
reply_text: Hello Michael, this bug has now been resolved. Please download the latest version of the app and let us know if it still persists.

author: Arthur Natella
review: love it

author: Christopher Davidson-Rose
review: The app is unreliable. I do two sessions per day, and more often than not, the second session is not recorded. Often, the sound does not work, and I have to restart, or the game doesn't start after the breathing. Add features,by all means, but please make the general function more reliable.

author: CJ
review: There are way too many glitches with the app in which you cannot connect the headset to a session. This time no matter what I do even delete and then re install, the app still won't connect and on top of that lost the data because it won't let you log in, however the q&a gas lights you to make it you believe that it was your mistake but they actually don't have an option to actually log in because when reinstalling they ask for email and then pw set up. So frustrating!
reply_text: Hi CJ, weâ€™re rolling out a new release that includes a fix for the login issueâ€”expected by Monday. As for the device not connecting, this is typically due to either the app running in the background too long or missing location permissions. Let us know if it persists after checking those - we are here to help!

author: Fabian Venga
review: can only agree with the other reviewers. the configuration for the sessions stopped working (i.e. you can't select anything).
reply_text: Hello Fabian, this issue often occurs when the app is backgrounded for an extended period of time. Can you please relaunch the app and check the settings menu again? Please email us at support@mendi.io if the issue remains unresolved.

author: Jarryd Myers
review: App is stable. Brain blood flow training is something the world sorely needs. The user interface is cluttered and poorly designed, but the core function is easy to use, I would give it 5 star except one problem. They hide the results from you. The purpose of the device is to increase your baseline oxygenation in the frontal lobe. It takes a measument of this at the start of every session when calibrating but it won't show you this reading, so you have no idea if it is helping or not.
reply_text:
Thanks for the great feedback! Mendi uses continuous wave fNIRS, which tracks changes in oxygenation, not absolute valuesâ€”so the baseline isnâ€™t shown to avoid confusion. Weâ€™re working on clearer progress visuals and improving the UI. Please email us at support@mendi.io if you have more questions.
Best,
Mendi Team

author: Karrie Wilson
review: If you work with it you will notice improvement. Helps me with remembering things.

author: Nia Rankin
review: The app crashes every other session. it freezes on a session and pushing the buttons does nothing. Also when trying to change the settings before the session, pushing the buttons does nothing. Not a good start to my Mendi journey. The app works again after restarting my device, but the configuration settings don't work when I push them.
reply_text: Hello Nia, thanks for letting us know about the bugs you've encountered. Have you already reached out to us at support@mendi.io? Our customer support team will help you troubleshoot these issues.

author: Damir Abdullaev
review: I hope lagging will be fixed. App freezes often , making almost unusable. i will change my rating once IT fixes bugs
reply_text: Hi Damir, performance issues can often be resolved by clearing the app cache and restarting your phone. Please try this, and if the issue persists, reach out to us at support@mendi.io. We'll keep an eye out for your email!

author: Martha Lemay
review: Just received Th Mindi Just finished 1st try and my chest is less tight ðŸ˜… I can breath easier, tho it gave a headache, it is a wonderful trade, can't wait to try it again

author: Colby Costner
review: A modern spin on meditation.

author: Merrick Rode
review: It makes me feel great, I can do my school work and focus better

author: Roger Williams
review: This is amazing! It literally expands your focus and changes your life view! I'm amazed!

author: Zakhar Kogan
review: Smooth + the device is phenomenal: it just works through the years and helps (esp. if one has ADHD, schizophrenia or other disorders where increased frontal lobe bloodflow is beneficial

author: Matthew Harrison
review: Easy to use and beneficial with consistent use.

author: billel nekdil
review: Better

author: Amir Sharif
review: When it's actually working it's not bad but irregular have issues opening the videos, connecting the device. The fact that only landscape mode is supported is also very annoying.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback, Amir. The issue with videos not loading is often related to phone's cache. Could you please try reinstalling the app, restarting your phone immediately afterward, and let us know if the problem persists?

author: Samuel Feinberg
review: Basic functions to support mendi headset. Requires force close if 2 sessions are not adjacent. Would love more in session options. Should be able to change sounds, change rolling ball, change colors, might be nice to see historical, might be nice to have coaching options. In setting up a session, it seems like there could be more options for biofeedback, would be great to change the graphic from rolling to controlling object like shrink grow, or balancing, or run in background audio. Good 4 now!

author: Mike Langford
review: I recently got a Garmin and discovered that Mendi has been counterproductive to my meditation practice. After 2 years, still having no control over the ball apparently raises my heart rate and stress levels through pure annoyance and constantly feeling like I am failing at something that is clearly just not possible. On the plus side, now that I know this, I have found a new way to use it. I do like the music, so I now shut off the sound effects, let the music play, close my eyes and meditate.

author: Bruno Montaner
review: None of the videos on the app work seems like it should be an easy fix but has been broken since I've bought the device. There is not a lot of explanation on the scores and what they mean.
reply_text: Hello Bruno, one solution that has worked for users experiencing the video loading issue is to delete the app along with its cache, reinstall it, and then restart the phone immediately afterward. You are welcome to email us at support@mendi.io our CS team will break the scores down for you (and how they are generated) in detail.

author: Gummbo Attavl
review: great however jams and freezes have to close the app it's been a issue since the beginning.also would be nice if installed other tasks or games something different as watching the ball constantly daily can get boring . also new features would be nice like having the stars be more pronounced and stays on the screen more lomger and prominently if you know what i mean as the stars disappear after a second and it feels great to have the stars adound for longer. thanks for commiting and supporting.

author: Eric
review: Amazing tool! I had to remind myself in the beginning not to be disappointed by lack of major results. I'm literally only on my fourth day of training and I've already set my baseline and I am seeing and starting to understand how this works. Plus, there are some fantastic psychiatrists on YouTube who dedicate their lives strictly to testing and using these types of devices and their notes and tests are extremely helpful. Highly recommend that you get the the Mendi device and download the app.

author: Raw S. (Rawman)
review: Paid $300+ for a device to work with an app. Without working app, this device is useless. Only to find out that apps tutorials dont open or work in the app. What a waste of money!!!
reply_text: Hello Raman, the issue youâ€™ve encountered is often caused by a cache error. Could you please try reinstalling the app, restarting your phone immediately afterward, and letting us know if the issue persists? Itâ€™s unlikely to happen again after these steps. We look forward to your update!

author: Wlm Bnz
review: App isn't cluttered or apps. It works well but sometimes needs restarting for second time use. Overall happy with it.

author: M. M
review: The app has several issues. It's flaky. It works after a clean start, but it's crashes after a while. Trying to take more than one training session doesn't work. It just hangs. The videos doesn't work either. They start playing and stops just after a few seconds. Clearing cache and re-instaling the app doesn't solve the issue. I would not buy or recommend the device given the poor quality of the app.
reply_text: Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced. Our team is aware of the issues you've mentioned and is actively working on stability updates to address them. These bugs are currently affecting a small subset of Android devices, but resolving them remains a top priority for our development team.

author: T Milani
review: Mendi is a unique brain stimulating device allowing you to train your brain using thought to control the animation on the app and really sharpens your senses! Really impressed with the customer service I have received from Mendi and couldn't be more appreciative and thankful for all they have done for me! Thank you to all of you at Mendi Your kindness and helpfulness is above and beyond expectations! Thank you!

author: Mosiur Rahman Apu
review: App is not smooth on Android, on my Samsung s23 ultra, after taking one measurement, if I try to go for 2nd measurement, the ball stop rolling, need to restart the app again. Plz fix this.

author: Pablo
review: Amazing device!

author: Richard G
review: I've used this daily since July 2024. There is now a significant difference in how I feel before using, and after using it. On average most days are more focussed, mood is more level and I feel more able to use reasoning more than reacting. If I want to focus on a thing, I can, far more than before. The effects are subtle and build over weeks, please note. I would like an unlimited time option PLEASE!!

author: Devon Anderson
review: The app on Android is pretty horrible. The play pause function on the videos don't work and so usually you have to restart the whole video since it won't unpause properly. There's no way to change the speed of the videos as well. Please fix this

author: Matthew Catalde
review: It helps me when I have either a hard day or it I need to cool down, I will have every day.

author: Brandon Hutchins
review: The performance of this app is terrible. Sometimes it works other times it freezes on the calibration screen. At times the sound settings don't actually follow what where I set it. I wonder about the reliability of the blood flow reading or mending score also. It is a great try but needs bugs worked out and certain validity checks

author: Martin J.
review: App: - No option to give feedback and support does't take it serious - "Improvements" make the app worse: --"Soundscape" is off, music still plays. -- Suddenly forced to change device orientation to start training which is not recognied correctly. -- Can't change settings when no device connected Device: +/- 80% reliable, sometimes no, sometimes super sensitive readings, most of the time accurate with a slight delay + Fairly Comfortable to wear + Easy to adjust + Strong Battery Lifetime
reply_text: Hello Martin, thank you for your comment! The soundscape issue has now been resolved. Could you also let us know where you reached out to our Customer Service team? We're committed to promptly addressing user feedback and reports, we'd like to ensure no messages are missed.

author: lyricelise scott
review: I have had my device since 2022. I like and have seen many changes to accommodate and improve the consumer experience. My son is 7, and I am allowing him to use it to improve his attention and focus at home and school. It's only been a week. I will give an update un 30 days. In the last year, I am forced to uninstall and reinstall in order for the app to connect and recognize the device is on. Not sure if anyone else is experiencing this, but it can be very annoying.
reply_text:
Thank you for sharing your experience. We look forward to updates as your son incorporates Mendi into his routine. A session before schoolwork can do wonders!
For the issue you mentioned, please ensure location services are enabled on the phone when using the appâ€”this should resolve it. If not, please send us an email at support@mendi.io.

author: Zoey Anderson
review: Worked once... second time it disconnected my phone after the brain scan part, and won't connect now. The app became unresponsive. The Zen desk help thing apparently isn't manned, so I emailed. It's charged, I restarted my phone, I made sure it wasn't connected to any other devices.

author: Scott Watson
review: Is there a way to add a calendar and a graph of all session? I would like to review an overall history of sessions and performance.

author: James Armstrong
review: Great app and device. Well built device. Had mine for about 3 years.

author: Dr. Janna Hansen
review: Hate the app!!! Have to uninstall/reinstall with nearly every use
reply_text: Hello Dr. Hansen, have you had a chance to reach out to our customer success team at support@mendi.io? Weâ€™d be happy to take a closer look at the device logs and the bug youâ€™ve encountered. We will be on the lookout for your email.

author: stclair jones
review: professional training is what it is where nothing else can replace what else can give you your accurate blood flow to your prefrontal cortex for your focus thankful to have the opportunity to use the apparatus for my own betterment to be better for others

author: Dr. Janna Hansen
review: I like the mendi experience but the app crashes all the time. I haven't gotten it to work for more than 1 day in a row. Have to uninstall and reinstall every day. Annoying!!!
reply_text: Thank you for this feedback, Janna. Please email us at support@mendi.io and our customer success team will help you troubleshoot this issue.

author: Justin Koster
review: This is so much fun, and it's crazy how effective this is right out of the gate!

author: Ù…Ø¤Ø³Ø³Ø© Ø­Ø·ÙŠÙ† Ù„Ù„Ø°Ø§ÙƒØ±Ø©
review: Very useful

author: 88 The Pianist
review: Not sure, but it seems like both my wife and I are more focused after some weeks of Mendi sessions. The app is amazing and the customer service excellent as they always responds quickly and provide good, detailed advice.

author: Jennapher Lawson
review: I just got this a few days ago, but so far so good. I have had no tech problems, and the UI is pleasant and easy to understand.

author: TREVOR ASHER
review: I have been using this application for almost a year now off & on. I have noticed an increase in myself Incredible. The APP. Has made multiple Improvements since it's beginning and I am VERY IMPRESSED with what it has become. Can't wait to see what it will be in years from now.

author: Jess K
review: Love this - when it works. Major issues since android 14 especially. I'm still wary but it seems like issues with sessions saving might be resolved and I'm very happy with the app.
reply_text: Hello Jess, this bug has now been resolved. Please give the latest update a try and let us know how it works.

author: Silvia Lamain
review: Updated review. App was previously broken and wasn't saving sessions or scores. It is now and also has some greatly improved features like the breathing at the start. I also appreciate that it doesn't show your score on the actual focus training. This is better. I cannot watch the videos though without them buffering. This is the only app this happens and it's not my signal. I checked this. 3 stars
reply_text: Hello Silvia, the issue you've encountered should be fixed in the latest update. We kindly ask you to test it out and let us know here if the problem persists.

author: Martin Cooper
review: The bugs in the appear to be fixed. I haven't had chance to test all that much though so fingers crossed. Overall a good system but not giving 5 stars as the videos still won't play long before freezing.
reply_text: Hello Martin, the bug you've encountered has now been fixed. Can you please give the latest update a try and let us know if the issue persists?

author: Glen Leatherman
review: Fascinating. Very enthusiastic and peaceful. You don't play with your mind, you are your mind. Present awareness and acceptance and breathe.

author: gaubriella
review: The app is a good tool to learn meditation.

author: Marc Stoudmann
review: Great app, day 2 of having the device. Devs, heads up. When I add emotions, they don't seem to appear in the session record. *Edit - actually it does appear, but only once one has done a session after that initial session. Like n+1 Also, if I do a session, and try to do one immediately afterwards, after calibrating, I see the pink screen and nothing else happens. Have to force close the app to be able to get out of this and successfully Day 3 wow! It's finally starting to click! This is amazing!

author: Daniel P
review: I really like mendi hardware, but the app is of medium quality. heavy bugs get fixed after some weeks/month, others persist. I tried to use automate to fix some problems but it seems impossible to correctly detect if the app is running in game mode. Notifications popup when the game is running, if auto brightness is on in dark environements, brightness pumps depending on the game background which distracts, if you change from user to guest, no other setting changes are used. support is nice
reply_text: Hello Daniel, the issue you've encountered should be fixed in the latest update. Please give it a try and let us know here if the problem persists.

author: Dan The Man
review: When I saw the price I was gonna say a poopy word
reply_text: Hello Dan, to clarify, the Mendi app is free to use, and has no in-app purchases.

author: Pauline Romas
review: App works great with latest update. Love how easy this device and app is to use compared to other ones like Muse. The music is very soothing + enlivening (2 options - the one I use is more like planetarium music). I'm so glad that it works in airplane mode, since I do my daily session before I connect my phone in the morning. Would like some kind of bell/ding noise when the session is complete so I can do it without music with my eyes closed.

author: Radoslav Tsvetkov (Rado)
review: Simple informative and to the point. Unfortunately no possibility to track long term progress neither to export the sessions.

author: Mark Alan Effinger
review: Fantastic experience. Mendi is one of the few consumer level neutral enhancement devices that actually works. And that I enjoy using regularly.

author: J M
review: Not bad, apart from relatively minor (though annoying) bugs

author: Andy M.
review: I have modified my review score from 1 star to 4 stars today. Previously the app would fail to record my sessions, actually creating more stress. Today it began working flawlessly. If it continues to work I'll be able to track my progress. If I see real benefit from the fNirs sessions that I'm hoping for, the rating will easily go to 5 stars. I love the device and really like the app. It's also great that unlike so many other devices, there's no subscription service to pay for.
reply_text: Hello Andy, please try clearing the app cache and let us know if the issue persists. You can always email us at help@mendi.io and our customer success team will help you troubleshoot this issue.

author: Dr. Abhimanyou Siingh Raathore
review: It has been working ok for the past 38 days that I have used it everyday. But today it is not registering the performance and brain activation percentage. The india team does not respond. So there is no customer support for such an expensive device. Be cautious if you choose to purchase it. Issues again.....the training screen doesnot allow you to go to previous day and start training not click able on training window. Please sort it out.
reply_text: Hello Dr. Abhimanyou, have had the chance to reach out to us at help@mendi.io regarding this issue? Our customer success team can help you troubleshoot it there. We will be on the lookout for your email!

author: Joe Romeo
review: I'd choose 0 stars if I could. it doesn't matter how cool and useful the device is if the software is unusable. I try to use this thing every month or so but they've never implemented proper support for Android 14. At this point it's been 5 months, you should just make your device iOS only.
reply_text: Hello Joe, please give the latest update a try, the issue you've encountered should now be resolved. Please do let us know if this is not the case.

author: Quinton Quartel
review: Mendi doesn't work with Android. Sessions never finish correctly - they just stop. Videos freeze up after 2 seconds
reply_text: Hello Quinton, this issue has now been resolved. Please download the latest version of the app and let us know how it works.

author: Ed Dobrzenski
review: App will still not record your session even after the most recent app update today. Please fix the app, it has been nothing but problems since Android 14 was released. Any benefit of the mendi device is lost by frustration dealing with these ongoing app bugs after each time you "update" and break it!
reply_text: Thank you for the feedback, Ed. The fix should be released by the end of this month. Happy to have you with us!

author: Hayley Maidment
review: Doesn't work. Just keeps crashing. Seems to be an expensive prototype. Sending mine back
reply_text: Hi Hayley! Thank you for writing to us. We've have made numerous stability updates to the Mendi Android for a smoother experience. Please let us know if you're still having the same issue with the Android app.

author: Cara Peffley
review: Definitely helps increase my focus productivity and performance during the rest of the day with the unexpected benefits of more calm and clear mood

author: Arda Cole
review: Does exactly what it says it does. Could use some more improvement as far as features(data analysis, new "games", etc). Had some issues with getting a 0 score over a period of a few days but fortunately looks like these are resolved now.

author: kay b
review: Portability and ease of use are the best qualities. I am looking forward to having a spect scan done after a few months to verify whether or not there are improvements. I think there is room to improve speed of signal processing.

author: N34stryker
review: Wow. So many issues with the app. Pretty sure the device just sends random signals. This will be going back.
reply_text: Hello N34stryker, can you please tell us what the issues are? We are here to help!

author: Stephen Sottile
review: A very useful device to develop focus and concentration. There appears to be an app glitch that is being investigated

author: Ashley Garcia
review: The app is okay but needs some more features, such as deleting sessions, adding notes post session, data extraction, and data trending. I had a couple of sessions that I wanted removed, one because the headband moved which led to inaccurate data and another that was a guest. Customer support informed me sessions cannot be removed. Additionally, sessions are not labeled to indicate if it's the primary user or a guest, even though you can select guest before starting the session.
reply_text: Thank you for this feedback Ashley, we are currently working on incorporating some of the suggestions you've made into the app. Regarding guest sessions, please note that they are not currently saved in the app.

author: Hevander Da Costa
review: I'm honestly very concerned I purchased a gimic product. No results are given after finishing a session (It's now been a nearly a month with NO UPDATE) it just gives a blank screen with the mendi color scheme. Often the feedback on focus can seem very random or easily stimulated through other methods. For nearly 300 dollar product its disrespectful to the customer to not have a functioning app.
reply_text: Hello Hevander, can you please give the latest release a try? The issues you've encountered should now be resolved.

author: Ted Petersen (Teddy R)
review: Best ever, soothing, relaxing, helps keeping me stable ðŸ˜€

author: Ersin Ertan
review: Something is really wrong with the app. It frequently doesn't move on to the next screen after the training session. And I have to clear storage each day for it to start recording my training sessions. The music sounds distorted on my phone.

author: Ben Dober
review: Simplicity and effectiveness is what drives mendi. Every week if I consistently apply myself I notice an improvement. It's also nice that it isn't subscription based, it helps. As far as I know it is like an open eyed meditation, like a "walking meditation." Cody Rall MD on YouTube, thanks! turned me onto Mendi and he says it's his "goto" device as well. I am hopeful that it'll have a tremendous real world impact. Personally, it's coming, I believe it, and that's half the battle.

author: Chris Connor
review: Ever heard of a mood wheel? While the app is pretty good and works well with the headband its still missing an obvious feature to make it more convenient. I love how I can just press the power button on my headband, and it syncs immediately with the app, along with habit feedback on the button, to tell me its on. However, when I start a new session and am asked how I feel, its just a long list of words that I have to search though. Do you realise how fustrating this is to do? This is why I ju

author: Musicnut Jim
review: As one gets settled into just how to relate to its purpose with the user, it is an advantage to helping one's brain/awareness growth.

author: Jordan Doty
review: Such a fun experience, and hopefully great training. I'm only a few days into my journey but there are a few things I can see that need attention on the app. The first thing is change is when coming out of a season I would like to see that sessions stats (makes sense right?), but no it shows me my best sessions stats for that day with no apparent way to look at a specific session. Second is making the guest feature more apparent and easy to use. Finally, more "games"!!
reply_text: Thank you for this feedback Jordan, we will make sure it reaches the product team. Looking forward to hearing more from you as you establish a consistent training routine!

author: Javier â€œAlexâ€ Perez
review: Mental health is important

author: Curtis Burkett Ashford
review: As a Stanford sponsored neuropsychologist and executive at CogniFit I know the brain. This device gives incredible insight on metrics that have never been available in such a simple and fun format, I love it!! Cant wait to learn more about what is changing over time in my longitudinal research with this exciting new data tool and connect closer with my brain!

author: Tae Kim
review: I can not even log into the app. I have two mendi bands and they worked well before.
reply_text:
Hello Tae, have you emailed us at help@mendi.io by any chance? Our customer success team can help you troubleshoot this issue. We will be on the lookout for your email!
Update Sept 26: Hello Tae, we would love to help out, have you emailed us by any chance?

author: Kirs (KP)
review: Looks good, lacks features and content to fully understand your progress. E.g., one day, your brain activity is higher and concentration prolonged, and you get a lower "rating" then when you hit 100 seconds of concentration. There's no explanation as to why nor individualized progress tips. Just the generic fluff blog articles. Support is nice but ultimately not really helpful enough to understand how you can improve because it's just general advice. New features are not visible in the app.
reply_text: Hello Kirs, as you know, control is only one of the three in-game metrics. The Mendi score combines all three of them, as well as your training consistency. This may explain why you have a lower Mendi score despite a higher control number. For personalized advice, email us at help@mendi.io, and we'll gladly answer your questions in detail.

author: Michael Sitar
review: Update.I would like appreciate it if there was a battery level indicator... Still no response on how the "score" is achieved and it would be nice to be able to compare scores over various time periods, such as you can do on Fitbit looking at your sleep in a useful graphic... I find the screen and the music pleasant. Looking forward to improvements. Tx
reply_text: Hello Michael, you may see the battery % on the training screen (top right corner) whenever your Mendi is connected to the phone/app. As for the score and other Mendi-related information, you can find more details in our small yet constantly evolving knowledge base at help.mendi.io. We hope this information proves helpful to you!

author: Fishscale Yayo
review: Very good overall, 4 out of 5 instead of 5 stars coz of 15 minutes restriction

author: Bernardo Antonio Fuentes Valle
review: After Update, I lost my history progress.
reply_text: Hello Bernardo! Without having access to the specific details, our initial assumption is that you may have inadvertently logged into a different account (possibly creating a new one instead of using your own). To resolve this, kindly reach out to us via email at help@mendi.io, and we will assist you in locating the original account.

author: Joe
review: Lovely app. I feel the start session button should be moved to the top of the training page. It occasionally asks if I'm in sunlight or moving when I'm still and using it normally. A suggestion to encourage engagement would be to have some activity stats of the collective user base, eg. X% of users that are currently on a 10,15,30 day streak, and when you unlock an achievement it includes a % of how many users have achieved it.

author: Johan Forsberg
review: Seems to be working well, but we really need more raw data access guys. Like asap, do it before the other brands fix it. Otherwise good product. Also maybe add more "games" in the app for variability â¤ï¸

author: Max Fiialkovskyi
review: the game and the headset are great! helps with focus and anxiety. the app is meh. after an update it became impossible to have more then one session a day. some days i need that extra session. also, app doesn't work without internet which is the stupidest thing for a meditation headset/app. Edit: the 'do another session' button reappeared. thanks! ðŸ™ Edit: day ago app took ages to load asd now it is breaking moment after starting.
reply_text: Thank you for this feedback Max. Regarding the issue you described about only being able to do one session per day, this usually happens when you minimize the app instead of fully closing it. To resolve this, please force-close the Mendi app completely, and then the "do another session" button should re-appear. Do let us know if this doesn't help.

author: John Exeter
review: Can't even create an account/log in--have tried with Google, Apple, and just an email.
reply_text: Hello John, please email us at help@mendi.io and our customer success team will help you troubleshoot this issue. Looking forward to getting you started with Mendi!

author: Daniel
review: Decent. Would be nice to have more versatility in games. Simple but effective tho. Would be great to allow multiple users!
reply_text: Thank you for this feedback Daniel. Happy to have you with us!

author: Carlo Hubo
review: It would have been nice if i have a macro view of my progress over the months and years. I have to contantly swipe left to access data of my performance months back. Also, they don't seem to keep/store all the data beyond several sessions. I'd like to see how Im progressing on a macro perspective.

author: Shay Shay
review: Despite ~2.5 months of shipping mishaps & an initial lackluster customer service experienÃ§e, I finally have the Mendi in hand. First impression, the device is well-designed, lightweight & comfortable, with a robust construction. I have just started to explore the app, so I cannot provide in-depth review wrt performance, but the user interface is clean and inviting. But, poor Cust. Service made fixing a simple shipping error an arduous exercise in patience. Be extra clear in your communications.
reply_text: Hello Shay, has the issue been resolved since you posted this review?

author: Lance Nakamura
review: Buggy, doesn't connect reliably, training and support info is minimal, no apparent correlation between what you are thinking/doing and movement of the ball. Score doesn't make sense.
reply_text: Hello Lance, our customer success team is here to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have. Contact us directly at help@mendi.io, and we'll be happy to evaluate your session logs to ensure your Mendi is functioning optimally, as well as provide you with valuable tips and tricks to fully utilize your device.

author: Israel P
review: After January 2023 update the App don't work on pixel 6a, making the device useless
reply_text: Hello Israel, thank you for flagging this for us. Please send an email to help@mendi.io and our customer support team will help you troubleshoot this issue.

author: MichaÅ‚ Przybylski
review: Working ðŸ‘I changed to 5-minute workouts, but in two times on different areas of the head, not only on the forehead. the results in the application make no sense to me, but I know that it works positively for me
reply_text: Thank you Michael! How is your training coming along?

author: Ben 9
review: More focus, understanding & ability to learn new & complicated stuff.

author: Mauro KalÄiÄ‡
review: Good device, lousy customer support no body answered my question on three platforms for more than 3weeks. Even airline company provides answeres sooner :(
reply_text: Hello Mauro, thank you for this feedback. Have your questions been answered since you posted this review? Please remember, help@mendi.io is the best place to reach our customer success team. Happy to have you with us!

author: Samuel S
review: App needs work it fails to start sessions sometimes sometimes
reply_text: Hello Samuel, please make sure you give the latest app a try. The sessions should no longer be missing. If the issue persists please email us at help@mendi.io and our development team will have a closer look at your account. Happy to have you with us!

author: David Casper
review: Bluetooth works really well!

author: Michael Burton
review: On a new phone running the most current Android OS, it works as described and works well with the required headset. the device and app seem to be beneficial. BUT on an older, supposedly compatible phone this app crashes constantly, and is unable to access data or the tracked progress. Also it keeps reporting that the headset needs to be recharged when it in fact does not.

author: Daniel lerma
review: The worse company just scammers they just take your money when you want to return just never answer is the same as just focusing on object nothing else more like useless game don't buy it
reply_text: Hello Daniel, we know that you're now in touch with our customer success team. The issue should be resolved swiftly!

author: Michael Daum
review: Does not work anymore. Skeeps asking for verification, which I have done, and gets stuck in a loop doing it. Fix it please.
reply_text: Hello Michael, thank you for posting here. Please let us know if the issue remains unresolved.

author: Zoey wang
review: Very satisfied with the new app update! Customizable volume level for both bg music and neural activity star pings*. Can't wait to see the new games later on!
reply_text: Hello Zoey, thank you for this feedback. It is important to remember that even though, our current game experience may not be as exciting as an arcade game, itâ€™s still of great benefit for your brain. We have several new games in the works - a more detailed public announcement regarding this will be published by late September/early October :)

author: Ryan Higgins
review: Great piece of hardware and a great app! I've definitely noticed an improvement from using it! Just one request. Is at all possible to realase a SDK? For people to use personally, not for commercial development. It would be nice to code something I could use on my laptop for instance. The only really minor complaint I would have about the app is the background music sounds like funeral home music. Other than that it's really pretty awesome. ðŸ‘

author: s
review: It is just impossible that the ball can never go belov 0%!
reply_text:
Hi S!
Thank you for writing to us.
The ball is not suppose to go below 0% because it's by design. It's an up-regulation neurofeedback designed specifically to engage the prefrontal cortex and increase neural activity. Please reach us on help@mendi.io if you have any more questions.

author: Jacek Zalewski
review: Sometimes after the session just doesnt save the data
reply_text: Hello Jacek, thank you for this feedback. Please download the latest version of the app - all the sessions should now be recorded correctly.

author: Phillip Lopez
review: How long has this app been like this? When was the last up date? Is that it...very disappointing.

author: Jesse
review: Poor Experience - Product doesn't work - Customer service lacking. I purchased the headset on Aug 8th. It arrived on Aug 11. The headset doesn't work.. it disconnects when I put it on my head and won't run the program. Reached out to customer service on the 12th. They responded on the 16th telling me they would send a replacement in under 2 weeks... this seems like an excessive amount of time to have to wait for a working product. Very unsatisfied with this process.
reply_text:
Hello Jesse, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We ship replacement devices weekly, a new device can take up to two weeks to get to your doorstep. Usually this ends up being closer to a week.
Looking forward to getting you started with a functioning device soon!

author: Ouchtor
review: It's been quite some time since you mentioned that there would be more mendi games. Are there still plans for that or did you just scrap the idea?
reply_text: Hello Ouchtor! We have several games in development at this time. We will make a public announcement regarding this in Q4 of 2022. Happy to have you with us!

author: John Cooney
review: Second day using this and the screen is as usual but no ball, nothing to concentrate or focus on, just a coloured background.
reply_text: Hello John, thank you for the feedback. We just replied to your email!

author: Jessica Adolino
review: Didn't use
reply_text: Hello Jessica, can you please help us understand the issue? We are here to assist you!

author: W B
review: Took one minute to set up the account and connect and it's been working flawlessly ever since. Even after three sessions I'm noticing improvements both within the app and in some minor day to day decision making processes. I'm not going to give it any less stars for this recommendation, but I would say a proper travel/storage case would be a very important item to either include with the purchase or be able to order separately.

author: David Guy
review: Excellent experience. Easy to use. Hope to see more charts of sessions.

author: Alex Martin Loewi
review: I've received FIVE emails verifying my email, and the app still doesn't recognize it. I've had this for 90 seconds and it's already infuriating -- not I to mention, it seems fundamentally unnecessary. Just pair with my phone! Why the hell do you need my email?
reply_text: Hello Alex, thank you for flagging this for us. We can see that the issue has since been resolved and that you are training now. We are simplifying the log-in flow in order to avoid similar issues moving forward, the new build is currently in Beta. We hope that the in-app experience will make you reconsider the one star review :)

author: Adrian Spier
review: It's good, the app works, but could be a bit more feature rich around statistics. Update: -1 star. I've been trying to log in for hours. I've changed my phone number and now I can't get into the app. Email verification has bugs. Awful experience.
reply_text: Hello Adrian, excited to have you with us on this journey! A lot more content (as well as more advanced stats and graphs) is currently in the works. Looking forward to hearing more from you as you keep training in the months to come!

author: Marek Hlava
review: The app needs more settings for customizing the experience. I had to turn off sound because I found the sound effects very distracting but I'd like to have an option to keep the background music on. I might even disable ball change effects as that makes me shift focus from the ball rotation to ball appearance changes. I have to relogin with my phone number too often. This is not a banking app.
reply_text: Hello Marek, thank you so much for your feedback and great suggestions! 1. We'll let you adjust sound levels in the next release. 2. Sorry about the authentication issues, we're working on a fix. 3. We'll be shipping a few new ball designs in upcoming releases. Thanks for using Mendi!

author: to Mix
review: Separate volume adjustment for the different sounds is direly needed as the stars are a bit loud. Further, even more annoying, is that the sound lags/cuts out on Bluetooth amplifier. It even causes other sound sources (e.g Spotify ) to lag/cut out. Please address this., especially the Bluetooth sound lag really reduces enjoyability.
reply_text: Thank you for the feedback and great suggestions Tom, separate volume adjustment is in the works and will be added soon. Happy to have you with us on this journey!

author: Robbin Nili
review: Spoty program.
reply_text: Hey Robbin, please email us at help@mendi.io and our development team will assist you with any in-app related issues. Thank you for being with us on this journey!

author: Enrico Dal pos
review: I love the product, you can definitely see improvement in focus, I only wish it had more features. Hope to give 5 stars with the next updates :)!
reply_text: Thank you Enrico, happy to hear you're enjoying your Mendi experience! As said previously, we have plenty of exciting features in the works for 2022. Remember, consistency is the key to long term success with Mendi.

author: Eureka2Educate Motivation 4 life
review: Great simple app that is used with the headband. Use it for focus and concentration

author: Justas Kazlauskas
review: Would be nice if you can set higher weekly goals

author: Rod Turner
review: Unimpressed so far. No effect, no results from practice. It seems to need improvement.
reply_text: Hello Rod, consistency is the key to long term success with Mendi. Please make sure you establish a sustainable self-brain-care routine around your practice and see what neurofeedback can do for you. If you have any specific points of feedback or requests we are all ears! Happy to have you with us on this journey.

author: Raymond Osborne
review: Works half of the time
reply_text: Hello Raymond, please make sure you're running the latest version of the app, we are implementing changes frequently. If the performance remains inconsistent be sure to email us at help@mendi.io and our development team will help you troubleshoot the issues you're experiencing. Happy yo have you with us on this journey!

author: Carrie Ann
review: Love it I cab tell a difference
reply_text: This is great Carrie, remember to remain consistent in your training! :)

author: Pablo Delahay
review: It hasn't been a week since I got my device. I'm simply amazed how well this thing works, even with the app not optimized for my Lenovo tablet (at least according to Google play) and connection to the Mendi headset at 20% at the very best. Even so I'm getting immediate results, my head feels a lot clearer and calmer throughout the day. Thank you for finally getting there! I do have two wishes: can you make this app more workable on other mobile devices pleaseeee and second, more soundtracks :)

author: JJ Ceno
review: It's clear that a tremendous amount of time, energy and care went into the app. Simply amazing. The only issues I have are minor and I think very specific; I have a Jelly 2 as my main phone, which is a smaller than usual android phone, and certain apps for some reason don't calibrate the screen correctly. In any case using a bigger (or normal, rather) screen with Mendi feels right. Great job on the app!
reply_text: Thank you for the kindhearted feedback JJ, have you emailed us at help@mendi.io? Our development team can look into the issue and help you troubleshoot it. Remember, consistency is the key to success with Mendi, happy to have you on board!

author: Trent Nguyen
review: Will there be more modes added to the app? I would like to use it while doing some tasks like maths and see the brain activity
reply_text: Hello Trent, we will release an additional mode before Christmas. Happy to have with us on this journey!

author: Jon Schommer
review: app is ok right now, but i cant listen to the audio because it clips and distorts when listening so i have to mute it.
reply_text: Hello Jon, thank you for your feedback. The audio shouldn't clip (are you by any chance using bluetooth headphones?) - Please email us at help@mendi.io and we will check if everything's working as intended.

author: Art Jury
review: Early yet seems fun why do they need location data? Afraid my brain is lost? More stars if you fix this
reply_text: Hello Art, Android users must have location services enabled in order to connect to Mendi. This is a requirement from Google for any app connecting to a Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) device. Our app does not collect or use your location at all. We recommend setting your permission level to â€œAllow only while using this app.â€ Hope this helps!

author: Jason
review: Work well, just needs regular use
reply_text: You are right Jason, consistency is the key to success with Mendi! Looking forward to hearing more from you as you keep training in the months to come.

author: Elhenris
review: Waiting years for this product, just to be stuck in in the login screen. You are asked to verify your email, but once you do and get confirmation you have, the app doesn't react and forever continues to ask you to verify the email - not allowing you to even enter the app. Making this a useless hairclip
reply_text: Hello Elhenris, sorry to hear about your initial experience. If you still have trouble logging in - please email us at help@mendi.io and our development team will assist you with this issue. We hope that you'll reconsider this review once you get started with neurofeedback training!

author: Alex D'Elia
review: Relaxing and easy experience!

author: Bezhan Akbari
review: My very first three minutes went ðŸ‘Œ I felt something that I never felt in my entire life before, wooow and amazing ðŸ‘
reply_text: Happy to have you with us on this journey Malik! Remember, consistency is the key to success with Mendi. Looking forward to hearing more from you in the months to come.

author: Puppy Science
review: Can't even make an account. It's nice to pay hundreds of dollars and the first thing you're told when trying to make an account is that your phone number, just a normal large, U.S. city phone number, isn't supported. I'm still rooting for this app. Just disappointed that I had to use a friend's number instead of my own.
reply_text: Hello! Have you emailed us at help@mendi.io by any chance? Our development team will assist you with troubleshooting this issue. Thank you for being with us on this journey!

author: JJ
review: Random response from a screen, cannot tell if it is genuine snake oil or recording a real output.
reply_text: Hello JJ, screen feedback should not be random. Please email us at help@mendi.io - our development team will assess your session logs to determine if everything's running as intended. You are also welcome to join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/mendivip where other users share best practices. Remember, practice makes perfect!

author: Neece
review: Fantastic. This thing is amazing so far and I can't wait to see how it grows and develops since it's super early days.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind words Neece, there's still so much more to come. Excited to have you with us on this Journey!

author: Arham Khalid
review: I can now really control my mindset. Really helpful
reply_text: Thank you Arham for your review! We are thrilled to hear about the impact Mendi is making in your life. Remember, consistency is key, so keep training regularly. Thanks again!

author: Richard Allan (Cern)
review: 3 days in, noticing measurable difference to my sleep. Brain feels less fuzzy - though that's hardly objective or measurable.
reply_text:
Hello Richard, thanks for the review! :)
Remember, consistency is the key to success with Mendi. We would love to hear more about your progress in a few weeks' time. Most of our beta testers have reported noticeable changes three weeks into their brain health journeys.
